revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Huawei |model=HHG2500 |revision=A |asin= |fcc_date=06/03/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=DareGlobal |manuf_model=AV2VOX25 |manuf_rev=M01-A |availability=common |type=CPE,wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=QISHG255E |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63168 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F2G08ABAEAWP |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT47H64M16HR-25E |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM63168 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53124S;BCM53124SKMMLG; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=VDSL2 |stock_boot=CFE; |stock_os=Linux;OpenRG;v5.4; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Vodafone-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Vodafone-.+ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=vodafone/admin |default_pass=vodafone/admin1234 |oui=90:35:6E |oui_eth=90:35:6E }} CPE from ''[[Huawei]]'' sold by ''[[Vodafone]]'' as ''Vodafone Station Revolution'' :as a cost reduction of the ''ADB AHG2500'' (''[[DareGlobal]]'' FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/RS3/ RS3]) Builtin 4x GbE port LAN and 1x GbE WAN port, VDSL2 modem and 2x FXS :The SoC is a [[Broadcom]] BCM63168 and the 5GHz Wi-Fi BCM4360 :It has an 802.11n 2T2R (2.4GHz) Wi-Fi and 802.11ac 3T3R (5GHz) :Stock firmware is based on OpenRg v5.4.
{{See also|Huawei HG658|Huawei HG253s v2}}
